neutral: I hope the nice weather holds up
I should buy more milk soon
Gotta pick up the kids soon
Did I leave the sink running?
Hope I don’t hit any traffic today
Can’t be late for work again
I’ve got a good feeling about today
I should go out after work today
I gotta give my mother a call today
confusion: Weird things are happening around here
It’s like the world is ending!
house_fire: I hope no one is inside!
No! I just paid off my mortgage!
house_lightning: Too bad they didn’t have a lightning rod
My insurance doesn’t cover this! I’ll be ruined!
A storm wasn’t in the forecast
I hope no one was hurt!
Everyone get inside and stay safe!
house_explosion: They must have left their stove on
Oh no, could my house be next?
My rock collection was in there!
I knew I should have moved last year!
I hope no one was inside!
I need to get out of here!
house_missile: It’s the end of the world!
Now where am I gonna live?
No insurance company will cover me now
What kind of town has missile attacks?
car_fire: My son predicted this! We gotta get out of this town!
I should have update my insurance policy!
car_lightning: Good thing they’re in a car
Bad day to forget an umbrella
Better they were in a car than on foot
I should count myself lucky it wasn’t me
That can’t be good for their car
car_explosion: That’s why regular car maintenance is important
I’m getting my kids out of here!
car_missile: It’s the end of the world as we know it!
I need to get my family out of here!
person_fire: He was two days from retirement!
Who’s going to raise her kids?
The aliens have come for us!
I knew the message in my alphabet soup was right!
person_lightning: What are the odds they’d get hit?
They should play the lottery next
I wouldn’t call them lucky, but that’s like a one in a million chance
The prophecy in my coffee was right!
person_explosion: That crazy gypsy woman was right!
The government put something in our water!
person_missile: Whatever she did must have been really bad
I’m not going out like this!
Nope, I’m getting out of here!
I knew I should have moved!
What kind of town is this?
sentient: Why is all of this happening?
You, you’re the one responsible for all of this!
So many innocent people are dead
Now it’s your turn to suffer!
How do you like being messed with?
